channel.title: Deathlypvpz V2 [pi]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/i3gb3c.png[/img]
[b]Fast Update List[/b][/center]
[code] -Fixed Pest control -added spins for getting level 99 -added reward for combat 99s -Fixed Master -Removed Vote4items -Made dung items out of dung jail instead of ban -Lady at port sarim harbour -Fixed milestone cape shop reqirments -Fixed stafftab logout sender -Added enddung and endgame -Fixed Barbarian defence minigame -Fixed Dungeoneering xp and tokens, and spawning -Fixed model hardcode positioning for torva -Added some lucky items -Added spin ticket -Wrecked loading bar, then fixed :D -Added Complectionist cape emote -New Armour in armour shop -Added Lunar Isle, with ship -Added New Bandit Camp NPC`s and bandits for training. -Added Double Xp Ring -Added auto donate for double xp ring for $2 -Added npc clipped following -Added npc clipping for attack -Fixed Agility points -Removed Save, because of dupe -added quickchats for other 99s -All Emotes with GFX finished -Fixed theiving cake stall -Removed flax spinning -Made man 10hp -Made, 2x xp ring and lamp UNTRADABLE,unsellable/transferable -Added Lunar Isle Bank -Dragon Kiteshield level requirments -Finished spec and wield shit for AQUA WHIP -Whip Cleaning with item 3188, done -Ragefire, Steadfast and Glaiven Boots added -Baaws shop made -Clipped Firemaking -Clipped npcs walking through tiles -Added Simple Uid System -Added Working Mithril seeds with Leave&Pick options -Added 100 Loyalty Points in 40mins -Made titles and stuff in quest tab 100 points. -Added Staff of light recolourer or 250 points. (quest tab) -Ticket Shop At Home -General use shop fixed up for junk -Prices Fixed -New Point Handler in quest tab -Added Super Donater (issDonator == 1) -Added ::drive and ::bank for donator, (DISSALLOWED IN MINIGAMES) -Removed All Windows in edgeville Bank -Added Stalls& Stall Manager at Home -Recepie for disaster added back -FunPk teleporter at home -Guy shouting about fun pk at home -PART CASTLE WARS DONE, TEST -Glory Amulet with working charges work -Added Magebank Praying for god, with free cape -Added Nulodion Back for making supers and overloads -Added Skillcape shop All 24 skills -Allowed people with just 1 99 Enter 99 skillcape shop -Fixed All Pricing [/code]
[center] [b]Media![/b]
Squeal Of Fortune Main [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/nbwz6o.png[/img]
Squeal Of Fortune Reward [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2aij6vl.png[/img]
Nex With Working Followers+Emotes/Gfx AND attack+speeches [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/b8lc9x.png[/img]
LoyaltyPoint Payout Per 40mins! [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/15s7f9g.png[/img]
Nice PointHandler! (Saves Space) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2irrjt1.png[/img]
Purchasable Mithrilseeds From Baaws Shop! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5u1iqs.png[/img]
RegionClipped Firemaking! No nubs can noclip! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/x538zt.png[/img]
Perfected Fullscreen + SuperDonator ::Drive! [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/16m60xc.png[/img]
Staff Of Light Recolouring+Titles for Loyalty Points Shown Above. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ytvby9.png[/img]
StaffTab System, Credit to tutorial Maker!! From r-s [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zu3y1v.png[/img]
Sailing Ships [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/24xgdc0.png[/img]
Actual Sailing Via New Cycle Events [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2cn6ruo.png[/img]
Pest Control, Now 100% [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ppahbt.png[/img]
Lodestones, Now All working [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10f42lz.png[/img]
99, shoutouts, and 3 spins! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2q9vz1w.png[/img]
Bandit Camp Training, Via Lodestones [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/do08de.png[/img]
Lunar Isle, With Banking [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2jb7cbo.png[/img]
Nice, Doublexp Ring [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/s4wdph.png[/img]
CastleWars Lobby (empty) [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ev9a38.png[/img]
CastleWars Waiting Room (empty) [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2942rmq.png[/img]
New Auras [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/eb7ktd.png[/img]
Npc Clipping [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2q2n8uq.png[/img]
Requested. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zwonjt.png[/img]
Old Xp Lamp, ReFramed, No multiclick [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14l3o0n.png[/img]
Full Milestone Capes! ADDED MILESTONECAPE EMOTE [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/b8pdz6.png[/img]
Aqua Whip, NICE STATS! [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/fe2ubt.png[/img]
[b]Download Now? [FIXED][/b] Client : http://www.mediafire.com/?xigtlqjdn2v771c Source : http://www.mediafire.com/?fmqp1xetgmiw73c Cache : http://www.mediafire.com/?imyfqb3la0ntvgz
[b]FAQ:[/b]
Q: Why wont the ip change in client?? A: There are three cases of "deathlypvpzvps.no-ip.biz" in client.java (client sided) CHANGE THEM ALL TO YOURS!
Q: How do i fix the steadfast boots? A: Download the model for steadfast boots off rune-server then place it in your raw file.
Q: How do i change the client chatbox background? A: in your cache c:/DeathlypvpzV2.2 (or along those lines) chatback.png in the main file just replace with another caches background that is the same just without the gfx on.
Q: How do i make myself a super donator? A: in your character file, "issdonor = 0;" change to "issdonor = 1;" and it will give your permission to use ::drive and ::bank Anywhere but minigames and wilderness.
Q: Why are you so baaws? A: I just am im afraid, i cant help it..
Q: Where can i give you reputation on runeserver? A: [url=http://rune-server.org/reputation.php?p=3645046]http://rune-server.org/reputation.php?p=3645046[/url]
Credits : Gabbe <3 Insanityx Creator (base) Some Tutorials for interfaces, and google[/center]

@angel_jack wrote:

looks like im a little late on this source but i just got into coding and im using your source as a base atm and was wondering how could i get an auto download cache and how could i make pms work i love your source and id like to make it a little better thats why i choose your shit to start with ive ben in the files and im not new new to coding ive tried befor when i was 13 but i got bored realy quick but i figured i have some spare time so i could find a new source if you would hack3r it would be great if you could add me on skype or something and show me how to do a few things to do this and give you some credit if i put it up

Skype name is: “figary32”

item.title: Deathlypvpz V2 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Define_Pure Define Pure
item.description:
@Define_Pure wrote:

Excuse me, i’m sure you get spammed for help but it would meen alot if you could explain how i could fix this problem, i’ve been trying for about 6 hours today and i can’t.

So i downloaded this source named ep1kScape v2, It was working great for me because i love Pking, and tried starting my own pking server. After a while the client wouldnt work for new players, i relzied the cache was deleted by him so now you can’t download it i poked around a bit and been working on trying to fix the client to make it so it picks up my cache link (his name and same cache just i uploaded to dropbox) And for some reason i can’t ever get it right, if you could explain like what files to upload or get on teamviewer or what files i need to edit client sidded to fix this it would mean aton! i was going to try your release but the combat system and such isn’t what i was looking for. I’m sorry.

THis was ment for Hack3r in his pm but his inbox is full, so now here it is if you can offer advice and know what your talking about i’d love the help + add me on skype if you’d like Brycejackson69

Anyways i have tv and think that would be easiest thank you.

Read full topic
